Extracted Variables:
- x: number of servings of apple flavored baby food
- y: number of servings of carrot flavored baby food

Extracted Constraints:
- Fat Requirement: 2x + 4y \leq B
- Folate Requirement: 5x + 3y \leq 100
- Minimum Carrot Servings: y \geq 2
- Apple to Carrot Ratio: x = 3y

Extracted Objective:
- Maximize Z = 2x + 4y
